statements: SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date, respondent_id FROM survey_data;
SELECT id, survey_name, survey_date, respondent_id, question1, answer1 FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT survey_name, respondent_id, question1 FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 123456;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_name LIKE 'Customer%';
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY survey_name ASC;
SELECT survey_name, respondent_id FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_name, question1, answer1 FROM survey_data WHERE survey_name LIKE '%customer survey%' ORDER BY respondent_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT survey_name, survey_date FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY survey_date DESC, survey_name ASC;
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_data GROUP BY survey_name HAVING total_responses > 10 ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_name, survey_date FROM SurveyData ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_name, question_1_response, question_2_response FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT survey_id, survey_topic, survey_description FROM SurveyMetaData WHERE survey_status = 'published';
SELECT survey_id, survey_topic, survey_description FROM SurveyMetaData ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT respondent_name, survey_topic FROM SurveyData AS SD JOIN SurveyMetaData AS SMD ON SD.survey_id = SMD.survey_id WHERE SMD.survey_type = 'Customer Satisfaction';
SELECT * FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01' AND survey_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT respondent_name, survey_topic, survey_description FROM SurveyData AS SD JOIN SurveyMetaData AS SMD ON SD.survey_id = SMD.survey_id WHERE SMD.survey_status = 'published';
SELECT survey_id, question_1_response FROM SurveyData GROUP BY survey_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participant_info WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM survey_data WHERE participant_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE question_id = 1 AND response ILIKE '%positive%';
SELECT participant_name, survey_responses->>'Q1' AS question1_response FROM participant_info JOIN survey_data ON participant_info.participant_id = survey_data.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE participant_id = 123 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;

SELECT survey_id, survey_date, survey_responses->>'question1' AS question1_response, survey_responses->>'question2' AS question2_response FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, join_date FROM participant_info JOIN survey_data ON participant_info.participant_id = survey_data.participant_id;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS num_questions FROM survey_results GROUP BY survey_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE result_id < 100 ORDER BY survey_id, question_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyParticipants
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM SurveyParticipants
SELECT id, participant_name, age, gender, survey_date FROM SurveyParticipants ORDER BY participant_name ASC
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT survey_id, participant_id, question_number, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE question_number IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM SurveyParticipants;
SELECT id, participant_name, age, gender FROM SurveyParticipants ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT survey_id, response_text, response_date FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_type = 'multiple_choice';
SELECT survey_id, survey_name, survey_description FROM SurveyMetadata WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT question_text, question_category FROM survey_questions WHERE question_type = 'multiple_choice';
SELECT respondent_name, respondent_email FROM survey_respondents ORDER BY respondent_name ASC;
SELECT category_name FROM survey_categories WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, analysis_name, analysis_description FROM survey_analysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 1
SELECT question_text, question_category FROM survey_questions WHERE question_category = 'General'
SELECT respondent_name, respondent_email FROM survey_respondents ORDER BY respondent_name DESC
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_description FROM survey_analysis WHERE LENGTH(analysis_description) > 100
SELECT question_id, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01'
